job.title: Machine Learning Data Engineer
job.industry: Staffing and Recruiting,Information Technology and Services
job.description: ***100% REMOTE***We're looking for a Machine Learning Data Engineer with an affinity for machine learning infrastructure and model development. Excellent opportunity to work for a leading eCommerce organization in a role with full remote flexibility!Responsibilities of the Machine Learning Data Engineer:Prototype and research ML featuresDrive ML solutions in Spark and Tensorflow to productionPresent and communicate internally and externallyParticipate in continuous improvement of team's engineering processes and infrastructureMentor and coach junior engineers and participate in code and design reviewsRequirements of the Machine Learning Data Engineer:Demonstrated ability to analyze large data sets and identify gapsAbility to design and deploy solutions in a Hadoop environmentProficiency in Java and Linux environmentsBasic ML knowledgeKeywords: Data Engineer, Machine Learning, ML, Spark, Tensorflow, eCommerce, 100% RemoteJob ID: 352986
